data.eml:eml: Description of a new soft scale insect of the genus Pulvinaria Targioni Tozzetti (Hemiptera, Coccoidea, Coccidae) from Bogota, Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tanaka, Hirotaka, Kondo, Takumasa (2015): Description of a new soft scale insect of the genus Pulvinaria Targioni Tozzetti (Hemiptera, Coccoidea, Coccidae) from Bogota, Colombia. ZooKeys 484: 111-120, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.484.9280, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.484.9280
